column4: does this fstab entry look ok for mounting an external hard drive read/write for everyone? /dev/sdb1 /media/EXHD vfat auto, user, rw 0 0
personally I'd loose the caps in the mount point... but I'm lazy =)
well.. as far as I can tell.. yes.. vfat is FAT16 or FAT32?
ah.. it's already formatted? well.. give it a try.. see if it works
